last_episode_to_air.name: Point of No Return
last_episode_to_air.overview: Abby heads to Penn Point Dance Academy in Bakersfield, CA, a family-run hip hop studio on the brink of financial ruin.

name: Abby's Studio Rescue
overview: The renowned dance coach Abby Lee Miller hits the road to transform dance studios on the brink of disaster. Follow Abby as she dishes out tough love and no-nonsense advice to give dance studios a second chance to finally bring home the gold.

episodes.name: Abby to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Abby heads to Warwick, RI to help a struggling dance studio, but finds that the owner is missing and too anxious to even come to her own studio. With dance moms at each others' throats and a building in disrepair, will Abby be able to convince the owner to come back and take control?

episodes.name: Abby Meets Her Match
episodes.overview: Abby heads to Northridge, CA, to help another dance studio in trouble, but when the owner takes offense to Abby's tough love critique, she kicks Abby out and a battle ensues.

episodes.name: Delusions of Dance Grandeur
episodes.overview: Abby arrives in Shelton, CT, and finds a studio owner in total denial about the problems at her studio. Abby enlists the help of Maddie, Mackenzie, Kendall and Nia from "Dance Moms" to show her the error of her ways, but are the problems at the studio too great for her to overcome?

episodes.name: Legacy of Lunacy
episodes.overview: Abby heads to Dance Legacy in Indianapolis, IN where she finds an overbearing studio owner at war with her irresponsible daughter over studio operations.

episodes.name: Daughter Dearest
episodes.overview: Abby heads to Indiana, and finds a dance studio whose owner is neglecting the other kids to focus on her own daughter, the star dancer... but is she actually hurting her daughter by keeping her at the studio, instead of allowing her to pursue her career?

episodes.name: Battle of the Blondes
episodes.overview: Abby heads to Krystle Beck Dance Company in Apple Valley, CA where she's immediately confronted by out of control dance moms battling it out in the middle of the studio's main lobby. Owner Krystle Beck is overwhelmed by the pushy moms and Abby must help her regain control of her studio before the owner is forced to close its doors.

episodes.name: Point of No Return
episodes.overview: Abby heads to Penn Point Dance Academy in Bakersfield, CA, a family-run hip hop studio on the brink of financial ruin.
